codeList:
helm repo add zilliztech-milvus-operator https://zilliztech.github.io/milvus-operator/
helm repo update zilliztech-milvus-operator
helm -n milvus-operator upgrade milvus-operator zilliztech-milvus-operator/milvus-operator
apiVersion: milvus.io/v1beta1
kind: Milvus
metadata:
  name: my-release
spec:
  components:
    enableRollingUpdate: true
    imageUpdateMode: rollingUpgrade # Default value, can be omitted
    image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.5.0-beta
apiVersion: milvus.io/v1beta1
kind: Milvus
metadata:
  name: my-release
spec:
  components:
    enableRollingUpdate: true
    imageUpdateMode: all
    image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.5.0-beta
apiVersion: milvus.io/v1beta1
kind: Milvus
metadata:
  name: my-release
spec:
  components:
    enableRollingUpdate: true
    imageUpdateMode: rollingDowngrade
    image: milvusdb/milvus:<some-old-version>
kubectl patch -f milvusupgrade.yml
apiVersion: milvus.io/v1beta1
kind: Milvus
metadata:
  name: my-release
spec:
  # Omit other fields ...
  components:
   image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.5.0-beta
kubectl patch -f milvusupgrade.yaml
apiVersion: milvus.io/v1beta1
kind: MilvusUpgrade
metadata:
  name: my-release-upgrade
spec:
  milvus:
    namespace: default
    name: my-release
  sourceVersion: "v2.1.4"
  targetVersion: "v2.5.0-beta"
  # below are some omit default values:
  # targetImage: "milvusdb/milvus:v2.5.0-beta"
  # toolImage: "milvusdb/meta-migration:v2.2.0"
  # operation: upgrade
  # rollbackIfFailed: true
  # backupPVC: ""
  # maxRetry: 3
$ kubectl create -f https://github.com/zilliztech/milvus-operator/blob/main/config/samples/beta/milvusupgrade.yaml
kubectl describe milvus release-name
